org.springframework.data.domain

类 Sort.Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.domain.Sort.Order
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable
    封闭类:
    Sort

    public static class Sort.Order
extends Object
implements Serializable
    PropertyPath implements the pairing of an Sort.Direction and a property. It is used to provide input for Sort
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Order(Sort.Direction direction, String property)
      Creates a new Sort.Order instance. if order is null then order defaults to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION
      Order(Sort.Direction direction, String property, Sort.NullHandling nullHandlingHint)
      Creates a new Sort.Order instance. if order is null then order defaults to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION
      Order(String property)
      已过时。 
      since 2.0, use by(String).

      Creates a new Sort.Order instance.
      boolean equals(Object obj) 
      Sort.Direction getDirection()
      Returns the order the property shall be sorted for.
      Sort.NullHandling getNullHandling()
      Returns the used Sort.NullHandling hint, which can but may not be respected by the used datastore.
      String getProperty()
      Returns the property to order for.
      int hashCode() 
      Sort.Order ignoreCase()
      Returns a new Sort.Order with case insensitive sorting enabled.
      boolean isAscending()
      Returns whether sorting for this property shall be ascending.
      boolean isDescending()
      Returns whether sorting for this property shall be descending.
      boolean isIgnoreCase()
      Returns whether or not the sort will be case sensitive.
      Sort.Order nullsFirst()
      Returns a Sort.Order with Sort.NullHandling.NULLS_FIRST as null handling hint.
      Sort.Order nullsLast()
      Returns a Sort.Order with Sort.NullHandling.NULLS_LAST as null handling hint.
      Sort.Order nullsNative()
      Returns a Sort.Order with Sort.NullHandling.NATIVE as null handling hint.
      String toString() 
      Sort.Order with(Sort.Direction direction)
      Returns a new Sort.Order with the given Sort.Direction.
      Sort.Order with(Sort.NullHandling nullHandling)
      Returns a Sort.Order with the given Sort.NullHandling.
      Sort withProperties(String... properties)
      Returns a new Sort instance for the given properties.

      Returns a new Sort.Order

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Order

        public Order(@Nullable
             Sort.Direction direction,
             String property)
        Creates a new Sort.Order instance. if order is null then order defaults to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION
        参数:
        direction - can be null, will default to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION
        property - must not be null or empty.

      • Order

        public Order(@Nullable
             Sort.Direction direction,
             String property,
             Sort.NullHandling nullHandlingHint)
        Creates a new Sort.Order instance. if order is null then order defaults to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION
        参数:
        direction - can be null, will default to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION
        property - must not be null or empty.
        nullHandling - must not be null.

      • Order

        @Deprecated
public Order(String property)
        已过时。 since 2.0, use by(String).
        Creates a new Sort.Order instance. Takes a single property. Direction defaults to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION.
        参数:
        property - must not be null or empty.

    • 方法详细资料

      • by

        public static Sort.Order by(String property)
        Creates a new Sort.Order instance. Takes a single property. Direction defaults to Sort.DEFAULT_DIRECTION.
        参数:
        property - must not be null or empty.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0

      • asc

        public static Sort.Order asc(String property)
        Creates a new Sort.Order instance. Takes a single property. Direction is Sort.Direction.ASC and NullHandling Sort.NullHandling.NATIVE.
        参数:
        property - must not be null or empty.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0

      • desc

        public static Sort.Order desc(String property)
        Creates a new Sort.Order instance. Takes a single property. Direction is Sort.Direction.ASC and NullHandling Sort.NullHandling.NATIVE.
        参数:
        property - must not be null or empty.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0
